Class DevelopmentCard

java.lang.Object
ca.mcgill.nalmer.splendormodels.Card

ca.mcgill.nalmer.splendormodels.DevelopmentCard
Direct Known Subclasses:
BaseDevelopmentCard, OrientDevelopmentCard
public abstract class DevelopmentCard extends PrestigeCard
Represents a development card.

    • changeColour

      protected final void changeColour(ResourceColor newColor)
      Changes the colour of the card. Can only be used if colour has not already been set.
      Parameters:
      newColor - New colour.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if color has already been set.
      NullPointerException - if newColor is null.
